title: Best of The Herd: 03/13/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 03/13/2019
description:
After trading for Odell Beckham Jr., the Browns now have very high expectations and Colin isn't convinced the franchise can handle that.  He talks with Jay Glazer about Le'Veon Bell making a mistake sitting out 2018 to get a long term deal.  Plus, FOX CFB & Draft Analyst Joel Klatt joins Colin from Kyler Murray's pro day and talks about him being the no-doubt #1 pick. Presented by Perky Jerky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
